thread.title: UAE- Apparel unveils community centre in Ajman
thread.title_full: UAE- Apparel unveils community centre in Ajman | MENAFN.COM

author: Khaleej Times
title: UAE- Apparel unveils community centre in Ajman
text: (MENAFN - Khaleej Times)Apparel Group has launched its first community centre in the UAE - Grand Centrale in Ajman. His Highness Shaikh Humaid bin Rashid Al Nuaimi Member of the Supreme Council and Ruler of Ajman inaugurated the edifice offers the convenience of a neighborhood shopping centre with the variety that comes with big malls. Speaking on the occasion chairman Apparel Group Nilesh Ved said the opening of Grand Centrale - Ajman marks yet another milestone in the history of Apparel Group and brings a step closer to opening 1200 stores by the end of 2015. "It has taken months of hard work and unwavering commitment to make this dream a reality. I do believe the centre will become the destination of choice in Ajman for those seeking exceptional value in an easy shopping environment". Apparel Group is a global fashion and lifestyle retail conglomerate caters to shoppers through 54 international brands at its over 1000 stores spread over four continents. The Dubai-based multi-retail conglomerate has carved its strong presence not only in the UAE Kuwait Qatar Bahrain Oman and Saudi Arabia but opened thriving gateways to market in India Singapore Jordan Indonesia Thailand and Malaysia. It also evolves plans to enter markets such as Iraq Egypt and the broader African continent. -
